protein.specific_function: Mediates Rho signaling to activate NF-kappa-B and may confer increased resistance to apoptosis to cells in gastric tumorigenesis. May play a novel role in the organization of septin structures

reference.reference_text: Fu Q, Yu L, Liu Q, Zhang J, Zhang H, Zhao S: Molecular cloning, expression characterization, and mapping of a novel putative inhibitor of rho GTPase activity, RTKN, to D2S145-D2S286. Genomics. 2000 Jun 15;66(3):328-32.
